channel.title: Help when i run my server ect
channel.description:
when i try to run my server it says....
the system cannot find the path specified
what can i do to stop that

item.title: Help when i run my server ect
item.dc:creator: @xparty-hatszx xparty-hatszx
item.description:
@xparty-hatszx wrote:

or… go to “start”
right click “computer” or “my computer”
advanced system settings
environmental variables
make a new one.
name it PATH

2nd step
for value… dont type anything yet.
go to computer > C:\ > program files > java > ur version of java > bin
go up to the address bar, right click copy address.
paste the address in the value
press ok
NOW RE-RUN YOUR SERVER!! SHOULD WORK
GL… Post any problems

Read full topic
item.source: Help when i run my server ect

item.title: Help when i run my server ect
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

Right click run.bat and look at the JDK version then compare it to yours…

Read full topic
